author: Special Correspondent
text:
A meeting of office-bearers of the Salem city units of parties in the People’s Welfare Front (PWF) was held at the office of the Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi (VCK) here on Friday.

G. Jayanchandran, secretary of the Salem urban district unit of the VCK, presided. The office-bearers of the MDMK, CPI (M) and CPI participated.

Statue

The meeting adopted a resolution condemning the police for removing the statue of Ambedkar in M. Perumapalayam and urging its installation at the same venue.

The meeting called upon the cadre of the constituents of the PWF to participate in the workers' meeting scheduled to be held in the city on Sunday.

The workers’ meeting of the PWF constituents of Yercaud, Attur and Gangavalli Assembly constituencies in Salem district was held in the city recently.

District secretaries V. Gopalraj (MDMK), P. Thangavelu (CPI-M), A. Mohan (CPI), S. K. Muthu (VCK East district secretary), spoke.
title: Meeting of PWF office-bearers held
